bioconda.name: arriba
bioconda.summary: Fast and accurate gene fusion detection from RNA-Seq data.

biocontainers.name: arriba
biocontainers.summary: Fast and accurate gene fusion detection from RNA-Seq data

biotools.summary: Arriba is a command-line tool to detect gene fusions from RNA-Seq data based on the STAR aligner. In addition to fusions, it can detect exon duplications/inversions and truncations of genes (i.e., breakpoints in introns and intergenic regions). Arriba is the winner of the DREAM SMC-RNA Challenge.

bioschemas.name: Arriba
bioschemas.summary: Arriba is a command-line tool to detect gene fusions from RNA-Seq data based on the STAR aligner. In addition to fusions, it can detect exon duplications/inversions and truncations of genes (i.e., breakpoints in introns and intergenic regions). Arriba is the winner of the DREAM SMC-RNA Challenge.
